DOC.brief_summary: This trial aim analyze whether inhalation hypertonic saline combine positive expiratory pressure ( PEP ) device increase amount sputum expectorate chest physiotherapy session ( inhalation + bronchial drainage ) .
DOC.brief_title: Positive Expiratory Pressure During Inhalation Hypertonic Saline Patients With Cystic Fibrosis
DOC.detailed_description: All patient perform two different arm treatment crossover randomization . Each arm treatment apply 5 consecutive day . The wash-out period one week . Before start trial patient inhalation formation . During study period patient ' pharmacological treatment remain unchanged
DOC.criteria: Pass inhalation test Chronic sputum production , least â‰¥ 10 ml /24h Cystic Fibrosis ( CF ) diagnose ( establish genotype sweat sodium > 70 mmol/l sweat chloride > 60 mmol/l ) Clinically stable time recruitment ( defined requirement antibiotic change respiratory medication precede 4 week ) Trained use autogenic drainage technique ( least 6 month ) Inhaling hypertonic saline since least 6 month To able provide write , informed consent perform protocol evaluation Active massive hemoptysis previous 2 month Patient transplantation retransplantation list Patient already participate another study time
